name: They Are Stronger Together!
description:
For Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Your objective is to farm Aliens, to do this you have to wait for them to group up and hit them with your Core Weapon, the more enemies there are in screen the more Brakenite you get, use this to repair your Ship and buy Upgrades.

But don't let them overpower you, your Ship is very fragile in the early stages and Repairs are expensive.

You have a Shield that can block most things out there, use it to block one side while you Shoot with your Turret the other.

Your Turret can help you thin out the Aliens if things get out of control plus it can shoot other Bullets  and Missiles.(be careful not to shoot yourself as bullets can Bounce.)

Controls:

Use Q and E to move your shield.

Use the Mouse to Aim and Shoot.

Use Space to use your Core Weapon once its fully charged.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sharkmon - Original Idea

Sharkmon - Music

@Bup & Cots - Code

@owaruuu - Design and Planning

Batitoño - Concept Art and Pixel Animations
